#summary Hints on how to produce proper readable javadoc comments
#labels Phase-Implementation

= !JavaDoc Hints =

 * !JavaDoc comments are written in HTML
 * To force a linebreak, use "`<br>`". Example:
 Using "`<br>`":
 {{{
 /**
 * Line 1<br>
 * Line 2
 */
 }}}
 will result in:<br><br>
  <font color="blue">Line 1</font><br>
  <font color="blue">Line 2</font><br><br>
 Whereas not using "`<br>`":
 {{{
 /**
 * Line 1
 * Line 2
 */
 }}}
 will result in:<br><br>
  <font color="blue">Line 1 Line 2</font>
